head: The dentist periodontist or dental hygienist
tail: through a deepcleaning method called scaling and root planing

meta.context: The dentist, periodontist, or dental hygienist removes the plaque through a deepcleaning method called scaling and root planing.

head: Root planing
tail: of rough spots on the tooth root where the germs gather

meta.context: Root planing gets rid of rough spots on the tooth root where the germs gather, and helps remove bacteria that contribute to the disease.
In some cases a laser may be used to remove plaque and tartar.

head: your periodontist or dentist
tail: procedures to help regenerate any bone or gum tissue lost to periodontitis

meta.context: In addition to flap surgery, your periodontist or dentist may suggest procedures to help regenerate any bone or gum tissue lost to periodontitis.

head: natural or synthetic bone
tail: in the area of bone loss

meta.context: Bone grafting, in which natural or synthetic bone is placed in the area of bone loss, can help promote bone growth.

head: a small piece of meshlike material
tail: between the bone and gum tissue

meta.context: In this procedure, a small piece of meshlike material is inserted between the bone and gum tissue.
Growth factors – proteins that can help your body naturally regrow bone – may also be used.
